DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
NominalDiameter
CrossSectionArea
TensionForce
DocAttribute.Documentation: The maximum allowed tension force that can be applied on the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: PreStress
DocAttribute.Documentation: The prestress to be applied on the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: FrictionCoefficient
DocAttribute.Documentation: The friction coefficient between tendon and tendon sheet while the tendon is unbonded.

DocAttribute.Name: AnchorageSlip
DocAttribute.Documentation: The deformation of an anchor or slippage of tendons when the prestressing device is released.

DocAttribute.Name: MinCurvatureRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The smallest curvature radius calculated on the whole effective length of the tendon where the tension properties are still valid.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcTendonType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcTendonTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcTendonTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an _IfcTendonType_.
